document_data.caption: A map of Mulhorand showing Klondor on the River of Spears.
document_data.name: Klondor
document_data.mainbody: '''Klondor''' was a town located in the country of [[Mulhorand]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B1dlc}}
document_data.Geography: Klondor lay along the north shore of the northern branch of the [[River of Spears]] in western Mulhorand in the [[Great Vale]] at the foot of the [[Sword Mountains]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The precept of Klondor in the {{YearlinkName|1357}}, was a [[warrior]] of [[Assuran]] named [[Haskrayth]]. A group of [[mercenaries]] from [[Chessenta]] worked out of Klondor to provide aid against the threat of [[monster]]s.
